title: Emergency Micro-Grant
description: Small, rapid support for urgent needs (rent, food, medicine).
details: Covers essential living expenses during sudden emergencies. Typical review within 24–48 hours.
eligibility: Open to active learners facing unexpected hardship. A short explanation and basic proof of need are required.
steps: Sign in and open the Emergency Micro-Grant form.
Describe the situation and the urgent expense.
Upload basic proof (receipt, invoice, or landlord note).
Submit. We review within 24–48 hours and notify you by email.
documents: Mobile wallet or bank details for disbursement

title: Uplyfted Microloans
description: Zero-interest microloans for course tuition or equipment.
details: Zero-interest, flexible repayment tailored to your training schedule. Intended for tuition, tools, or exam fees.
eligibility: Active or admitted learners with a clear learning plan and repayment timeline.
steps: Sign in and open the Microloan request.
Submit. We respond within 3–5 business days.

title: Childcare Stipend
description: Short-term childcare support while you take training.
details: Covers part of childcare costs during classes, exams, or interviews. Typically awarded for 2–8 weeks.
eligibility: Parents/guardians enrolled in programs or attending verified training activities.
steps: Sign in and complete the Childcare Stipend form.
Provide a childcare provider quote or estimate.
documents: Training schedule or proof of attendance

title: Emergency Shelter Access
description: Safe, temporary housing options for urgent displacement.
details: We triage your situation and connect you to vetted local shelters and partners. Priority for immediate safety needs.
eligibility: Anyone facing urgent housing insecurity or unsafe conditions.
steps: If you’re in danger now, call the hotline.
Otherwise, sign in and complete a quick shelter request.
We match available options and coordinate an intake.
